code: import React from'react';import{useCombat}from'../../hooks/useCombat';import{ENEMIES}from'../../constants';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CombatPanel=()=>{const{combat,startCombat,stopCombat}=useCombat();const handleStartCombat=enemyId=>{startCombat(enemyId);};const handleStopCombat=()=>{stopCombat();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"combat-panel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Combat"}),combat!==null&&combat!==void 0&&combat.isFighting&&combat.currentEnemy?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"active-combat",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Fighting: ",combat.currentEnemy.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"enemy-stats",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Health: ",combat.currentEnemy.health,"/",combat.currentEnemy.maxHealth]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"health-bar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"health",style:{width:`${combat.currentEnemy.health/combat.currentEnemy.maxHealth*100}%`}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Attack: ",combat.currentEnemy.attack]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Defense: ",combat.currentEnemy.defense]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"stop-combat-btn",onClick:handleStopCombat,children:"Run Away"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"enemy-selection",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Select an enemy to fight:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"enemy-list",children:Object.keys(ENEMIES).map(enemyId=>{const enemy=ENEMIES[enemyId];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"enemy-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:enemy.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Health: ",enemy.maxHealth]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Attack: ",enemy.attack]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Defense: ",enemy.defense]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"start-combat-btn",onClick:()=>handleStartCombat(enemyId),children:"Attack"})]},enemyId);})})]})]});};export default CombatPanel;
